summary: Website UI/UX updates across hero, Our Approach, and How It Works sections (button removal, card icon/border styling, click animation, and number layout adjustments).

existing_features.title: Remove the "Contact Us Today" button from the homepage Hero section so only the "Schedule a Consultation" CTA remains.

Update the homepage "Our Approach" cards to (1) replace the numeric labels with icons in a style consistent with the rest of the website, (2) use a white card background, (3) apply a permanent gold border using the site’s existing gold theme color, and (4) add an on-click subtle upward-lift interaction that does not change the border color on click.

Update the homepage "How It Works" section so each step’s number appears outside of (separate from) the text box/card, with the number shown first and then the bordered text box. Apply a gold border to the step text boxes using the site’s existing gold theme color.

new_feature_requests.summary: Hero section: remove the “Contact us today” button entirely.
Our Approach cards: replace the numeric labels with icons in a style consistent with the rest of the website.
Our Approach cards: set card background to white and apply a permanent gold border using the site’s existing gold theme color (no border change on click).
Our Approach cards: add an on-click subtle upward-lift interaction effect.
How It Works section: move numbers outside of the text boxes (numbers followed by bordered text boxes).
How It Works boxes: apply a gold border using the site’s existing gold theme color.

projectName: Homepage UI updates: hero CTA removal, Our Approach card redesign, How It Works number layout
